name: The Frederick Hotel
description: Buzzy Tribeca hotel offering snug, stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi, plus a modern Italian restaurant.

name: NOMO SOHO
description: Luxe rooms & suites in a hip lodging with a swanky restaurant, a glam cocktail lounge & a 24/7 gym.

name: Beckett's Bar & Grill
description: Sports on big screen TVs, draft beer & pub food in a historic building that's stood since 1603.

name: Gilligan's
description: Design-focused property famed for its artistic public spaces, upscale rooms & hip bar scene.

name: Tribeca Grill
description: Buzzy Robert De Niro-owned mainstay for innovative New American cuisine & a stellar wine list.

name: Shake Shack Battery Park City
description: Hip, counter-serve chain for gourmet takes on fast-food classics like burgers & frozen custard.

name: Balthazar
description: Iconic French brasserie with steak frites, brunch & pastries in a classy space with red banquettes.

name: Locanda Verde
description: TriBeCa hot spot showcasing rustic Italian cuisine in a lively atmosphere.

name: The River Café
description: Landmark eatery, newly renovated, offering a New American menu & stunning views of Manhattan.

name: Macao Trading Company
description: A bi-level, 1940s gambling parlor sets an exotic backdrop for Chinese-Portuguese small plates.

name: Lombardi's Pizza
description: Landmark NoLita restaurant serving coal-fired, thin-crust Neapolitan pizza since 1905.

name: Bubby's
description: Weekend brunch hot spot serving homestyle American eats with many locally sourced ingredients.

name: Cipriani Downtown NYC
description: Upscale scene where an international crowd tucks into Italian food chased with Bellinis.

name: Delmonico's
description: A New York classic opened in 1837, serving prime beef in old-time environs.

name: M1-5 Lounge
description: Roomy, dimly lit, group-friendly bar with a relaxed vibe, private booths & a bar-food menu.

name: Sarabeth's
description: Posh chain serving American fare, including brunch, dinner & creative cocktails.

name: La Esquina
description: Sceney Mexican spot with no-frills taqueria, cafe & exclusive basement brasserie/tequila bar.

name: Wolfgang's Steakhouse
description: Upscale chophouse chain serving dry-aged steaks, seafood & wine in an elegant setting.

name: Golden Unicorn
description: Massive, bustling Cantonese mainstay ferrying a wide variety of dim sum via fast-moving carts.

name: Ferrara Bakery & Cafe
description: Venerable outfit offering its famed cannoli & other Italian desserts, plus espresso, since 1892.
